queries.name: Exposed to everyone
queries.description: Find targets that are exposed to everyone including all internet
queries.query: Find Everyone that ALLOWS * as d RETURN d._key as key, coalesce(d.baseUrl, d.url) as target, d._integrationInstanceId as scope, d._source as source

queries.name: Get domains
queries.query: FIND Domain as d RETURN d._key as key, d.displayName as target, d._integrationInstanceId as scope, d._source as source

queries.name: Get domain cname,a,aaa records
queries.description: Find domain cname, a, and aaa records
queries.query: FIND DomainRecord as d WHERE d.type = 'CNAME' OR d.type = 'A' or d.type = 'AAA' RETURN d._key as key, d.name as target, d._integrationInstanceId as scope, d._source as source

queries.name: Get data stores
queries.query: FIND DataStore as d RETURN d._key as key, d.baseUrl as target, d._integrationInstanceId as scope, d._source as source
